a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of reported Guinea worm cases, World
Note: For the early period especially the number of reported cases is much lower than the true number of cases. Greenaway (2004) reports an
estimate of 3.5 million cases for the year 1986.
Data source: The Carter Center (2022), World Health Organisation (2021)
